args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Brake Light Failure from Software Error

Daimler Trucks North America, LLC (DTNA) is recalling certain 2026 Freightliner 108SD, Freightliner 114SD, Freightliner Cascadia, 2025-2026 Freightliner Business Class M2, Western Star 47X, and Western Star 49X vehicles.  A software error in the advanced signal and actuator module for the automatic emergency braking system may cause the brake lights to fail to illuminate.Brake lights that fail increase the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 1895.0"
